item.description:
For our second meetup we'll mix it up. We'll be meeting at Marilyn's home in Newburyport for more classic party games.

Once we get a feel for where everyone's interests lie, we can start to branch out into more specific nights for types of games.

(As a note: Marilyn's house is cat-free and is on the corner of High and Oakland Streets with plenty of parking, and she is on the first floor.)

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Game Night in Newburyport
